morning.name: Senso-ji Temple
morning.description: Tokyo's oldest temple located in Asakusa, a must-see for its traditional architecture and bustling surrounding market.

afternoon.name: Ueno Park and Zoo
afternoon.description: A large public park that houses a zoo, museums, and beautiful seasonal foliage.

evening.name: Akihabara
evening.description: Famous for electronics shops, anime, and manga stores. A paradise for tech enthusiasts and otaku culture fans.

suggestions.name: Tokyo Skytree
suggestions.description: A broadcasting tower with an observation deck offering panoramic views of Tokyo.

suggestions.name: Asakusa
suggestions.description: Historic district with Senso-ji Temple, Nakamise shopping street, and traditional Japanese culture.

suggestions.name: Odaiba
suggestions.description: A futuristic island with shopping malls, entertainment complexes, and the famous Rainbow Bridge.

morning.name: Shibuya Crossing
morning.description: The world's busiest pedestrian crossing located in front of Shibuya Station.

afternoon.name: Meiji Shrine
afternoon.description: A Shinto shrine dedicated to Emperor Meiji and Empress Shoken, set in a large forested area.

evening.name: Harajuku
evening.description: Known for its quirky fashion shops and street culture, as well as the serene Yoyogi Park.
